title: AI Competitive Switch-Kit
pain_point: APAC customers switching to GlobalStack because we lack a migration path from Zenith Labs.
tech_spec: RAG-based agent trained on competitor pricing models and migration friction.
author: Sarah Chen, Director of Sales Ops

title: Automated Contract Reviewer
pain_point: NorthAm compliance overhaul causing 12-day bottlenecks in contract closing.
tech_spec: LLM-based entity extraction and non-compete flagging to automate first-pass reviews.
author: Marcus Thorne, Legal Tech Lead

title: EMEA Growth Multiplier
pain_point: Under-capitalizing on massive EMEA Professional tier momentum.
tech_spec: Predictive analytics to identify and target lookalike accounts in the EU Professional segment.
author: Jessica Wu, EMEA Growth Head

title: Automated screening for CI/CD
pain_point: Manual friction in vendor onboarding causing delays.
tech_spec: Modular AI automation to replace manual data entry.
author: Emily Zhang, Principal Engineer
